text: <para-intro> The last 50 years have seen an increasing number of immigrants to other countries . People moved due to a number of reasons , namely better educations or higher salary jobs . Some people thought that they should follow the local customs in order to integrate into their adopted countries ’ cultures . However I strongly believe that
<AC> they are able to sustain their cultural identities and doing so help they keep their origin values </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> Firstly ,
<AC> maintaining one ’ s cultural identity is a key important rule to help individuals emerge in the new multicultural environments </AC>

<AC> Take Australia for example , immigrants from varieties of nations have a day called multicultural day where people from each country prepare their food and traditional activities for displaying in the public venues </AC>
<AC> Many Australians come this day to enjoy the shows , learn about the cultures and admire the diverse values </AC>
<AC> These feedbacks , in turn , help raise one ’ s pride of their cultures and help people understand each other more </AC>
. Thus this makes it clear that
<AC> sustaining the cultural values of immigrants is paramount essential </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly ,
<AC> it is crucial to keep one ’ s identity </AC>
for
<AC> they need a connection back to their country as well as teach their children their value of origin </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> children immigrated to a new country will face social troubles in school with new friends </AC>
<AC> In this new environment , parent should find friends coming from their same country so that they can socialize in a very familiar manner as feeling being home </AC>
<AC> Fail to create this familiarity makes them felt isolated , in the extreme can lead to social disorder like autism </AC>
. Hence , it is clear that
<AC> keeping the cultural traditions in the destination countries is tremendous important </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To conclude , although
<AC> there are opposing ideas of neglecting one ’ s cultural values to adapt in the new cultures </AC>
. As far as I am concerned ,
<AC> sustaining the traditions will make the immigrated people keep their cultural identity and give them confident among the many culture society </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Although some people think that the major part of school schedule should be entirely devoted to academics , I truly believe that
<AC> the physical education part should not be outweighed </AC>
<AC> Physical exercises help to create healthy nation , assist to learning through direct observation and finally aid to financial development of a country </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all , the ancient Latin proverb says : " Anima sana in corpore sano ", which means that
<AC> healthy body is basis for healthy soul </AC>
<AC> There is a direct linkage between people ' s health and the frequency of doing physical exercises </AC>
<AC> The more we practice , the better we feel </AC>
. Additionally ,
<AC> there is a fact that one can improve health conditions with everyday physical activity : gradually , step by step we change physical condition to better </AC>
. So ,
<AC> if the entire nation , from their school ages begin going for sports and try doing that everyday , eventually it may help to build healthy nation </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Besides ,
<AC> when we practice outdoors and indoors sports , many aspects are getting clearer </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> when a person goes jogging everyday , eventually he can understand his own body through direct observation </AC>
. Alike ,
<AC> the school basketball team gains more knowledge on how to succeed in some particular kind of throwing the ball into hoot practicing rather than learning theoretically </AC>
. Furthermore ,
<AC> almost all natural science discoveries were made by direct observation , which is a part of physical education </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Last , but not least ,
<AC> financial sustainability of a region mostly depends on how healthy the population is </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> the money invested into physical education program can save allocations into healthcare </AC>
, since
<AC> the nation is comparatively healthy </AC>
. Along with that ,
<AC> physically healthy people can contribute more both into economical and social development </AC>
. As a matter of fact ,
<AC> the better a person feels , the better his brain works </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> putting physical activities in early steps of human development would finally lead to mentally healthy society </AC>
. As hence
<AC> it ends up with financially competitive country </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In the conclusion , I would like to say that
<AC> the more attention is withdrawn to a problem of physical education , the more influence we can get on academic success of students </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-body> Many people find that
<AC> students at schools and universities still learn much more from lessons with teachers </AC>
. They argue that
<AC> teachers teach students how to write , read and calculate since they are in kindergarten </AC>
<AC> And when they are in primary school , teachers teach them more further knowledge , like writing skills and using computers </AC>
<AC> It is teachers that help them with obstacles in schooling </AC>
. On the other hand ,
<AC> students gain most of the knowledge through teachers and learn what is right and wrong with the assistance of teachers </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Those who feel that
<AC> students learn far more from other sources , such as the Internet and television </AC>
, firmly believe that
<AC> within this sources students learn lots of things which they can ' t learn in classes </AC>
<AC> They can only input some key words and google it , and then there are numberless articles and websites related to it </AC>
. In this case ,
<AC> students learn things easily </AC>
. Moreover ,
<AC> they contend that good television programs do teach students </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> Discovery Channel has many instructive episodes </AC>
<AC> Students have knowledge of others cultures , outer space etc </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Personally , I think that
<AC> students learn far more from their teachers than from other source </AC>
. Because not only do
<AC> teachers teach us knowledge but also the skills to tell right from wrong </AC>
. Just imagine : if a student can ' t even make out whether the source is reasonable or not , then how can he get the right information to help him to learn ? </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> It is very hard to find a home that does not have a television . Nowadays , number of television channels and programs are increasing everyday . Unfortunately ,
<AC> most of people do not have a plan for make a limitation or schedule for watching television </AC>
. I agree with that idea that
<AC> television devastate families ties </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body>
<AC> In spite of enjoying watching television shows , it is really time consuming task </AC>
<AC> Emergence of new television channels or shows are not surprising </AC>
<AC> We kill time by tracking these channels so at the end of the day we understand it is late for doing any other activities </AC>
<AC> This is a problem that suffers all of us everyday </AC>
. At the end ,
<AC> there is no time for call to our parents or friends </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second , I think
<AC> watching television programs makes us lazy </AC>
<AC> We usually spend our times in front of television for at least three ours a day when we come back home after eight - hour working in the office </AC>
. Hence ,
<AC> we do not have time to spend for healthy activity such as going to a gym or doing other sports </AC>
<AC> This makes us a lazy person who prefers to do sedentary activities like watching television shows rather than be active and sociable </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Last but not least ,
<AC> some television programs have a negative effect on viewers </AC>
<AC> Some thriller or action movies advertise negative activities such as doing criminal activity </AC>
<AC> These genre of programs has more negative effects on our teenagers </AC>
<AC> They usually try to mimic what they see on movies in their daily behaviors </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To sum up ,
<AC> killing our time , making us lazy , and advertising negative behaviors are just only few reasons to show how television is destructive </AC>
. I think
<AC> it is a global problem to solve this problem and it is need global contribution to find a solution </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Nowadays , more and more people begin to select prepared food as their daily meals , since
<AC> it can effectively save time which is considered as money in our modern society </AC>
. However

<AC> it is obvious that prepared food can bring about some negative influence result from utilizing the artificial ingredients , ignoring the nutrition of food and modifying people ' s eating habits </AC>
. In this essay , I would like to explain why this is not a good thing based on the three reasons above . </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all ,
<AC> to make their food easier to prepare and taste delicious , almost every producer adds a wide range of artificial ingredients in to the food that is now purchased by most people </AC>
. Some
<AC> ingredients being added have caused dire consequences </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> there are usually some articles in newspapers and magazines which report the relationship between certain chemical components in some food and diseases </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> easy - to - cook foods sometimes could be dangerous for human ' s health </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>
<AC> Not cooking fresh food will also lead to the lack of nutrition </AC>
. It is true that cooking prepared food needs much less time in comparison with the fresh food .
<AC> Whereas some research has apparently demonstrated that prepared food is unable to support enough nutrients we need , especially for children who are growing up </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> In addition , cooking is one of arts humans create .
<AC> The more prepared food we eat the more cooking skills we lose </AC>
<AC> At the increasing living pace , the majority of people tend to choose microwave as their unique cooker that help them prepare a dish in five minutes </AC>
. But
<AC> rare people have been aware that this has contributed to a modification of cooking habits , which may cause the loss of our custom and culture about cooking </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , although
<AC> the invention of prepared foods definitely satisfies the demand of some people who are busy in their work </AC>
<AC> it is not a good thing </AC>
. Cooking is not a waste of time , contrarily , it is crucial for our health and culture . </para-conclusion>
<para-body>
<AC> Some people prefer to recognize globalization as a threat to ethnic and religious values of people of their country </AC>
. They think that
<AC> the idea of globalization put their inherited culture in danger of uncontrolled change and make them vulnerable against the attack of imperialistic governments </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Those who disagree , believe that
<AC> globalization contribute effectively to the global improvement of the world in many aspects </AC>
<AC> Developing globalization , people can have more access to many natural resources of the world and it leads to increasing the pace of scientific and economic promotions of the entire world </AC>
. In addition ,
<AC> they admit that globalization can be considered a chance for people of each country to promote their lifestyle through the stuffs and services imported from other countries </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Moreover , the proponents of globalization idea point out
<AC> globalization results in considerable decrease in global tension </AC>
due to
<AC> convergence of benefits of people of the world which is a natural consequence of globalization </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> I would rather classify myself in the proponents of globalization as a speeding factor of global progress </AC>
. I think it is more likely to solve the problems of the world rather than intensifying them . </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Many people believe that children should study at school to have more knowledge that prepare better for their future . Others , however , think that these children may disrupt their school work and should be allowed to leave school early to find a job . Personally , I tend to agree with the point of view that
<AC> student have to be forced to study at school </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all ,
<AC> schools offer to students a good environment with experienced professors and high quality programs for studying </AC>
<AC> It creates the best conditions for students education and can force them to focus on their school work instead of wasting their time to do useless things </AC>
. Second of all ,
<AC> schools provide lots of academic knowledge to students </AC>
<AC> Students may learn professional skills , expand their understandings and gain experiences </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> they have more opprotunities to find a job and to be successful in the future </AC>
. For example , as we know ,
<AC> employer always prefer to hire an employee of high degree who have professional skills </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Nevertheless , it is not unreasonable that some people think that
<AC> children should interrupt their school work and get a job </AC>
<AC> Whether children can learn a lot at school </AC>
<AC> there are many subjects that will be of little value to them in the future </AC>
. Furthermore ,
<AC> children can learn social skills when they have a job </AC>
<AC> They can get more experiences that can not be obtained at school </AC>
<AC> Working helps children be more independent and teach them to esteem and manage the money that they ' ve earned </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Overall , I believe that
<AC> students should study at school </AC>
. Even though
<AC> there are some advantages of leaving school to find a job </AC>
<AC> studying at school is always the best choice for children ' s future </AC>
<AC> There are many ways that can train children to learn independent and social skills instead of getting a job </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Libraries and sports activities play important roles in universities success . Most university rankings pay attention to quality of these two activities . In my opinion
<AC> universities should invest in libraries more than anywhere else </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First , I think
<AC> a library is vital and strategical part of a university </AC>
<AC> All professors and students need to have a modern and well - equipped library </AC>
because ,
<AC> after internet , library plays an important role in research </AC>
. Although
<AC> sport is important </AC>
<AC> it does not have the same priority of library has </AC>
. In addition
<AC> only small part of students attend sport activities </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> in my university number of students who use the library is much more than students do sports activities </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second ,
<AC> usually libraries do not have income </AC>
<AC> Most libraries are free not for students also for public </AC>
. Hence ,
<AC> universities support is vital for libraries </AC>
. But
<AC> sport activities have a good income </AC>
because
<AC> every sport has different matches and for each match they have a lot sponsors </AC>
. Also ,
<AC> they have this chance to sell their important matches tickets </AC>
. To conclude ,
<AC> there are good ways for sports activities to compensate their expenses , but it is very hard for libraries to find a good way for have an income </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Last but not least ,
<AC> investing in libraries has a long - time result </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> a library can buy a lot of new books or they can buy more computers </AC>
<AC> Most of the library facilities are stable and you can use them for a long time </AC>
. Besides ,
<AC> in the far future , they become more valuable </AC>
. On the other side ,
<AC> most sports facilities except buildings are usually can be used in short - time and they are not persistent for a long - time </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In spite of the importance of sports activities ,
<AC> libraries are more important </AC>
<AC> They are critical part of universities and a good university has to have a modern library </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Creativity is the ability to think beyond the obvious . Many governments restrict the artistic works of the creative minds .
<AC> Creativity originates in a free mind </AC>
. Hence ,
<AC> creative artists must be given the freedom to express their ideas without any restrictions </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body>
<AC> Time and again , creative artists like Michaelangelo , Picasso , Salman Rushdie , Shakespeare etc . have made artistic works which gave a social message </AC>
<AC> Right from sculptures to paintings , books to drama and movies , all these artistic works have reflected the contemporary social issues of different eras </AC>
<AC> Creative works help to create social awareness by giving a social message </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Nonetheless ,
<AC> innovative works makes people realize things in a peaceful way and peep into their own conscience </AC>
<AC> It helps to raise issues and criticize the wrong doings of the governments </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> Bangladeshi writer Taslima Nasrin was accused of acting against the government , just because she raised a social issue </AC>
<AC> This type of approach is a hurdle in promoting creative minds </AC>
. In addition ,
<AC> creativity also gives aesthetic charm </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Unfortunately , many governments restrict the artists .
<AC> Frank Zappa once said , " Mind is like a parachute , it doesn ' t work if its not open “ </AC>
<AC> Restrictions would just curb the innovative ideas of the artists and would limit their brains </AC>
<AC> Like the media , artists should also be given the freedom to express their ideas freely </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> However ,
<AC> artists should also know not to hurt the sentiments of the people </AC>
<AC> Many artists have been involved in controversies because of hurting the religious or social beliefs of the common people </AC>
<AC> Artists should have self - awareness not to create vulgar , hurtful or useless works which do not serve any purpose </AC>
. I firmly believe that
<AC> artists should be given the freedom of expression </AC>
<AC> Mind can not work when it is chained in boundaries </AC>
<AC> Imagination is at its best when the mind is relaxed and free from the fear of government or any restrictive laws </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Many individuals throughout their life face with at least one failure in different areas such as education , love and economy . Some believe when a person faces with a failure the best way is to forget that and releases that ; however , I completely disagree with this idea . I always believe that
<AC> a defeated person has to try and try until to achieve her or his goal </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all ,
<AC> when people face with a failure they can learn a large number of things from that failure , therefore in the next effort they try to avoid doing and repeating that mistakes </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> most of inventors in the first phases of their job face with some problems and defeats , but in the next stages they learn how to deal with problems </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second of all ,
<AC> experience shows while people doing a job constantly , they become more experienced in that subject , so in the final effort they become successful with the high percentile </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> scientists experiment a substance for a long time , after they gain lots of experience and knowledge about that subject they decide to make it final </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To sum up , I would maintain that
<AC> people should not give up when they face with a failure </AC>
. In opposite ,
<AC> they have to learn new points from that failure , and they become more experienced </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Capital punishment is a controversial debate in many countries . In a world where brutal crimes need to be deterred , it may be true that the death penalty is an efficient retribution to admonish the violence . However , as the society grows , human rights become more highly respected ,
<AC> " murdering " criminals is therefore immoral and hard to accept </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all , it is recognized that
<AC> every human being has the right to live and no authority is empowered to deprive one of life </AC>
. Although
<AC> what criminals cause to the society , specifically to the victims , is indeed significantly offensive </AC>
<AC> they are humans and their lives need to be valued </AC>
. In addition ,
<AC> execution does not resolve the consequences of crime </AC>
, not to mention
<AC> it could put the criminal ' s family through hardship while the pain of the victim ' s kin is never to be consoled </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly ,

<AC> capital punishment is certainly not the only option to control the amount of crimes , life imprisonment is just as effective by detaining the criminals in prison for the rest of their lives </AC>
. Moreover ,

<AC> in terms of punishment , living a miserable life with restriction to the world outside and sustaining the feeling of guilt every day in a dark bounded room are much more obsessing than being killed right away </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>
<AC> The third reason why the death penalty should be banned is the chance that innocent people are wrongly convicted </AC>
<AC> Juries are also humans , they may lack of discretion </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> many people are executed for the crime they did not commit , which leads to a question of fairness in judicial system </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , although
<AC> capital punishment presents an extreme warning to the community </AC>
, I firmly object to it because
<AC> it is absurd and inhumane </AC>
. Furthermore ,
<AC> it can be replaced by a life sentence </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> There is no doubt that companies , factories and businesses establish to provide products which are people ' s need and make a profit for their managers . However ,
<AC> I completely disagree with the idea that businesses should be allowed to do anything they want to make a profit </AC>
<AC> With this permission they are allowed to hit and damage everything for just making a profit </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> Firstly ,
<AC> if there is not any control on the businesses and they are permitted to do everything they want , they will threaten the beings ' life such as human , animals and plants </AC>
<AC> As every day we read and hear in televisions and newspapers that some factories hit the environment by their toxic substances </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Moreover ,
<AC> if we let them do anything they can to just make a profit , they will produce products with low qualities and high prices </AC>
, therefore
<AC> they might hit consumer ' s life </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> a few months ago it was broadcast from TV that a company which produced baby milk , sold milk which did not have quality and it caused a few babies die </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> all companies , factories and businesses should be monitored by governments and executive , and they do not have to let do anything they want just due to making profit </AC>
<AC> They can hit both the environment and human ' s life easily </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> The life today is totally different from half centuries before . Advances in technology do help humans to solve abundant of problems ; however it also deprives of some things that we had . In my opinion ,
<AC> life in the old days brings more happiness to people than today for several reasons </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> The first reason is
<AC> life is simple in the past </AC>
<AC> Nowadays , all humans compete together </AC>
. Since
<AC> world population getting higher </AC>
<AC> competition is getting fierce </AC>
<AC> If you are not able to handle your jobs , then someone will replace you right away </AC>
<AC> People need to put much more effort to keep their living condition </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> lives in the old days is easier than today </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second ,
<AC> the environment today is serious damaged </AC>
<AC> Looking out the windows , what I see isn ' t sky , trees or mountains , but is coldly high buildings </AC>
<AC> Everyday , I walk on hard roads , breath in polluted air , and live in a limited space </AC>
. What ' s worse ,
<AC> it has been proved that living in this kind of condition will result in some mental diseases </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> the environment our grandparents live is more comfortable than today </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>
<AC> The third reason is that the pace of life </AC>
<AC> Today , we are able to read the news all over the world , to chat with people through the Internet , or to travel around the world by planes </AC>
; however ,
<AC> it also means that any thing happens in the world will affect our life </AC>
<AC> If we cannot react properly and immediately , then we will be in a vulnerable situation </AC>
<AC> We have no choice but have to live in a fast pace </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , while there
<AC> some people live in a pretty good condition , it is only a minority </AC>
<AC> People are put too much focus on making wealth and progress in technology </AC>
; nevertheless , behind the glamorous facade of it , what we loss will never be returned . </para-conclusion>
<para-body> Firstly , some people suggest that
<AC> qualification should be the foremost measurement to determine the value of a employer </AC>
<AC> It is of importance that workers should be well educated and trained to perform duties of their job </AC>
. Specifically ,
<AC> people who work in professional fields such as medicals are required to have a university degree and years of experience </AC>
<AC> Social skills seem to be less important as they cannot contribute to the success of a surgery </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> On the other hand , it is no doubt that
<AC> the importance of social skills have been recognized by increasing number of employers </AC>
. It is because
<AC> people nowadays are required to work as a team in their jobs frequently </AC>
<AC> Interpersonal skill plays an essential role in helping colleagues to cooperate with each other , especially when conflicts arise </AC>
<AC> Better social skills allow them to resolve disagreements in a much more harmony way </AC>
. Besides ,
<AC> organization have been transformed to customers oriented </AC>
<AC> Excellent social skills can help employees maintain strong relationship with their clients which thus lead to a better customer satisfaction </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To my view , I incline to believe
<AC> qualification is still the fundamental determinant of an employee ' s competency of their jobs </AC>
. Yet ,

<AC> the importance of social skills should not be neglected as those skills can help one to perform their job effectiveness and efficiency by facilitating interaction and communication with others </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Attending university ' s classes is one of activities that students have to do . However , class is not the only source of knowledge . Students also learn from other sources such as experience , libraries and other people . I think
<AC> going to classes should be optional for students </AC>
for the following reasons . </para-intro>
<para-body> Firstly , the reason why university students should not be required to attend class is
<AC> sometimes the students in the university can learn better from other sources outside the class room </AC>
<AC> Student can also study by themselves in the library and focus on only the topic they do not understand </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> I have a close friend who was in the same department with me in the university </AC>
<AC> She learned quickly and understood everything in class so fast </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> she rarely went to class but spent most time to understand confusing topic </AC>
. Finally ,
<AC> she got very good grade when she was graduation </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly , students should not be required to attend classes because
<AC> they can manage the time spending on classes to do other benefit things if they already understand topic in the class very well </AC>
. In my experience ,
<AC> many times I did not attend biology class because my university does not require the students to attend classes </AC>
. Also ,
<AC> I had already studied all biology topics before attending university </AC>
. As a result ,
<AC> I spent the time of biology class to do my Chemistry research and got A + for both biology and chemistry </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , I think
<AC> the students should know what activities they should do at the time and have good management for their learning time </AC>
. Also , they have to know how to deal with the effects from not attending classes . So that ,
<AC> attending classes in the university will not be required to the students anymore </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> The advent of the computer is one of the results of the development of the advantaged technology . While some people advocate for the idea that computers have made life more complex and stressful , others support the idea that computers have made life easier and more convenient . In my point of view ,
<AC> computers brought convenience and easiness to our life </AC>
since
<AC> they enabled easier access to information and increased qualities of the communication </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First ,
<AC> computers through internet made our access to information easier </AC>
<AC> Through computers we can collect appropriate data very quickly , store it in the hard disc as long as we want and use it when needed </AC>
<AC> Search engines such as google , yandex with many features relevant to the characteristics of the information needed enable search of information in few minutes </AC>
<AC> Social networks such as facebook , twitter have changed traditional sources of information and decreasing the monopolization of the information by the governments </AC>
. Hence ,
<AC> with the use of computers we spend less time in search for information , and can get it from different sources </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second ,
<AC> in a globalized world that we live computers made communications faster , visual and cheaper </AC>
<AC> With the use of email our messages can be delivered to any person in any part of the world in few minutes </AC>
. In addition ,
<AC> it is convenient </AC>
because

<AC> you do not need to mile to the post office , but just click the mouse of your computer from the convenience of your arm chair in order to reach your friends , family members in any part of the world </AC>
<AC> Internet facilities such as msn , skype made visual communication possible </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> via skype people not just communicate with their family members and friends , but also make interviews for employment , enrolment into universities </AC>
. In result ,
<AC> communication has become cheaper , faster and visual </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Finally , I believe that
<AC> computers have made life easier and more convenient </AC>
in the ways that
<AC> it broadened the sources of information and made access more quick , a long with the improving quality of the communication in many ways </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> As a mass media majoring student , I think that it ' s true that
<AC> media is overemphasizing the personal lives of famous people in this modern society </AC>
. In my point of view ,
<AC> disadvantages of overemphasizing on personal lives of famous people by media outweigh its advantages </AC>
. My reasons include the following : </para-intro>
<para-body> It is no doubt that the
<AC> media provide information about an event that recently occurred somewhere and which is important to the people </AC>
<AC> The most important of all is that the essence of coverage accurate and not based on gossip </AC>
. However ,
<AC> journalism is changing </AC>
<AC> Some reporters are more interested with gossip than news relating to public issues , paying too much attention to the personal lives of famous people </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> First of all ,
<AC> gossip involves misleading images for the purpose of boosting newspaper sales or exciting public opinion </AC>
<AC> The audience may see a lot of photos in the kind of reports , which seems to tell a story </AC>
. Moreover ,
<AC> it is unfair that the ridiculous coverage may be a vexation for the famous people who are reported </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Furthermore ,
<AC> sensationalism distract the viewers from public or social problems </AC>
<AC> The media face the challenge that media executives must choose the content , which can attract the audience </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> these personal reports of famous people , unimportant information or distorted stories , will not solve problem related with the society </AC>
. In other words ,
<AC> yellow journalism block the viewers from significant news , such as education , environment and public issues </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Based on the above discussion , I agree with that
<AC> paying too much attention on personal lives of famous people may be a serious problem </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Some people think that life is a struggle , which means we may encounter numerous difficulties during our lives . Accordingly ,
<AC> stress management , how to survive our unbearable stress , is the most important skill that we should have </AC>
. Here are my reasons . </para-intro>
<para-body>
<AC> Stress , our body ' s way of responding to any kind of demand , can be caused by both good and bad experiences </AC>
<AC> Stress may be a positive mobilization to drive for success </AC>
. However ,
<AC> it is widely thought that we experience stress any time , which comes across unexpectedly that frustrates our goals </AC>
. As a result ,
<AC> if we don ' t have a good stress management skill , it may lead to some critical problems </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>

<AC> In the frenetic , fast - paced world , it is a very common predicament that all of us , from the young to the senior , feel depressed caused by stress , such as financial problems , exam stress , relationship difficulties and work overload </AC>
<AC> Some people regard stress as a power , which overcomes the obstacles to motivate themselves to do their best </AC>
<AC> other people cannot charge of their thoughts , emotions , and the way they deal with problems </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> stress management recently becomes a more significant issue in our realization </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Furthermore ,
<AC> stress takes a toll on our health </AC>
<AC> It is known that the modern life is frequently full of hassles , frustrations , and demands </AC>
<AC> This is one of the reasons why people were overwhelmed by constant stress </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> some people have physical problems , such as insomnia and headaches </AC>
<AC> Melancholia , the most fatal problem , even leads some people to commit suicide </AC>
. Consequently ,
<AC> it is necessary that we should reduce and cope with our stress in the goal of balancing our mind and body </AC>

. To avoid being a pessimist , we may try to conquer our distress by sharing our worry with friends or families , doing exercise regularly , and trying to see our troubles in a different way . </para-body>
<para-conclusion> For the above reasons , I believe that
<AC> stress management is an essential skill for everyone to learn and find their own way to solve their stress </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> We all know that television provides us many benefits ; it helps people relax , helps keep up with news , helps broad our mind . However , have you ever thought that television has destroyed communication among friends and family ?
<AC> I personally consider this fact as the harmful thing that television has brought upon us </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all , since
<AC> people watch television too much </AC>
<AC> they can be isolated from others </AC>

<AC> Children , for example , pay more attention on movies , music show provided by television and do not want to do anything else such as going to school or practicing exercise with friends will be taken apart by others </AC>
<AC> Gradually , their friends leave them behind either activities or studying </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly ,
<AC> with the rapid change of the standard of life , each family has three or four TV in each room is more common </AC>
<AC> Parents and even children do not want to communicate with each other instead of watching TV in their own room </AC>
. As a consequence ,
<AC> children will learn behavior from what they see on TV not from their parents </AC>
. Moreover ,
<AC> parents are not able to function their parental care as the necessary thing to children </AC>
. In this way ,
<AC> communication between family members is visibly destroyed </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Last but not least ,
<AC> watching too much television people will unconsciously learn bad behavior that sow division among human </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> watching film about terrorist children will be able to consider terrorism as a right thing </AC>
. What happens if they do act exactly the terrorist in Hollywood movies does ? is this one of the reason cause division in society ? </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , though
<AC> television has some good sides </AC>
<AC> it has destroyed communication among friends and family </AC>
. We need to quickly find the way to address this problem as soon as possible and the first concern is to reducing violent behaviors that children learn from television . </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> It is obvious that
<AC> parents are the first teachers who teach babies how to walk and speak and make children to become a good person </AC>
. Moreover ,
<AC> parents provide their children the best social skills and knowledge in order to prepare for their children ' s future life </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First ,
<AC> children are taught basic things , which influence their whole life , by their parents </AC>
<AC> As a baby , they do not know any thing all around but they learn everything from their parents </AC>
<AC> Parents always try to explain and describe tenderly all things in simple way so that their baby can understand and learn from that </AC>
. Consequently ,
<AC> parents bring the whole world of wonderful and colorful thing into their baby ' s little mind </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second ,
<AC> parents train their child how to become a good person </AC>
<AC> They always make their children basically say thanks and apology in the right way </AC>
. On the one hand ,
<AC> it is common that they try to explain who is a good or bad person </AC>
. On the other hand ,
<AC> children are shown how to behave well with others </AC>
. This seems to be easy but
<AC> this can influence positively their future children and makes children ' s behavior better before they face the real world </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Third , it is clear that
<AC> parents are ones who loves their children most and always take care of their children </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> they tend to provide the best knowledge and advice from their experience for children </AC>
<AC> Unlike a professional , parents always support children and give them much social skill so they can communicate well with others and have good habit in life </AC>
. In fact ,
<AC> parents ' support is one factor which makes people succeed in their life </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> parents are really the best teachers who give us much knowledge and advice </AC>
. Based on love , they always try their best to make good condition for their children development in order to prepare children ' s future life . </para-conclusion>
<para-intro>
<AC> It ’ s certainly better for children to grow up in a big city </AC>
. Of course you need to choose a good neighborhood .
<AC> I hold this belief because of two main reasons , academic and social reasons </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> Some people thinks that
<AC> if a child grows up in a big city they will be all day at home at the computer or at the video - game </AC>
, but
<AC> this is not true if you live in a neighborhood with other people about your age as I did </AC>
<AC> My friends and I used to play soccer , bike , climb trees and do a lot of other stuff every day </AC>
<AC> We did play video - games , but that wasn ' t our main activity </AC>
<AC> In a big city there are more kinds of people and more things to do </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>
<AC> I have a friend that grew up in the countryside </AC>
<AC> He said that he had to study a lot to pass the test to enter the university </AC>
. This is another downside of growing up in the countryside .
<AC> In a big city you have more qualified teachers and a better access to technology </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion>
<AC> Growing up in the countryside is not such a good experience </AC>
<AC> you won ’ t know a lot of people , there are gossips everywhere , and your life will be really limited </AC>
. If someday I have children , I ’ m absolutely sure that
<AC> they will grow up in a good neighborhood of a big city and they will be very happy about it </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Nowadays the automobile is one of the most significant forms of transportation in everyday life . Many people own cars and use them daily , which clearly shows how important they are . Generally speaking , I definitely agree with the statement that
<AC> cars have improved modern life </AC>
, for several reasons . </para-intro>
<para-body> Firstly ,
<AC> people are now able to overcome long distances in a short amount of time , which leads to numerous advantages </AC>
. For example in relationships .
<AC> Many people are now able to maintain relationships over great distances </AC>
because
<AC> they can visit each other regularly by using their vehicle </AC>
. From my personal experience I recall that
<AC> my car has always been a great help to see my childhood friends very often although I lived in another city </AC>
<AC> I was also able to establish a relationship with a man living 89 kilometers away </AC>
<AC> Thanks to my car we could see each other at the weekends and are still a happy couple today </AC>
<AC> Without my automobile we would probably not have been able to develop a relationship </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> In addition ,
<AC> cars increase the chance of employment </AC>
because
<AC> people are able to drive to work and can work further away from home </AC>
. Furthermore ,
<AC> they are more flexible </AC>
<AC> My father for example has always been working all around Germany and because of that earned more money </AC>
<AC> He used his car to drive to the other end of the country , worked there during the week and came home for the weekend </AC>
<AC> If he had no car , he wouldn ' t be able to see his family at the weekends so for him his automobile is a great benefit - not only in financial but also in social terms </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Finally ,
<AC> the automobile allows people to travel more often and thus get to know the world </AC>
<AC> If people do not own cars they are likely to stay in their hometown or village most of their life </AC>
<AC> They are mainly using public transport and are thus limited in accessing certain areas </AC>
<AC> There are still places in nearly every country in the world that cannot be reached by public transportation and can only be visited by car </AC>
. As a result ,
<AC> people who own a vehicle have greater access to more places and will see more of the world </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , the above stated reasons clearly outweigh the fact that
<AC> cars cause a lot of pollution </AC>
because
<AC> they provide flexibility , which is important in nearly all areas of life </AC>
<AC> Travelling , social life and employment are highly dependent on the flexibility of a person and there is nothing in the world that makes more flexible than an own car </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> In university education , students are given much independence in the ways of learning . Some students still rely on classes to keep up with the courses , while some students don ' t feel the need to attend classes because they believe that they can handle the exams . These different ideas of learning methods lead to a question whether it is necessary for university students to attend the class as long as they can pass their examinations . In my opinion , I believe that
<AC> students should always attend class no matter what the outcome of the exam is </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First ,
<AC> in terms of learning , attending class is more effective than simply studying alone to pass the exams </AC>
<AC> Classes are designed diligently for the students and professors absolutely bear more knowledge than the students </AC>
<AC> Professors not only have the knowledge , but also equip with experiences , knowing how to guide their students toward their academic achievements </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second ,
<AC> it ' s students ' basic responsibility to attend class </AC>
<AC> Attending class is the most persuasive way for the students to show respect to the professor as well as themselves </AC>
<AC> Many professors grade their students with class attendances </AC>
. In other words ,
<AC> class attendances are regarded as critical as examination performances </AC>
<AC> Those who even achieve high scores on exams could fail if they didn ' t show up in the classes </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Some people might argue that
<AC> if students already understand the contents on the class enough to pass the exams or they can study the course on their own </AC>
. Why wasting time going to classes ? Doesn ' t self - study more efficient ? However , in my opinion ,
<AC> this is a rather immodest way of thinking </AC>
. I believe that
<AC> professors can always give students more than students themselves could because of the experiences and their qualifications as professors </AC>
. Besides ,
<AC> even if students believe that they are so brilliant to surpass their professors , they can still go to the classes to discuss with professors and classmates </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> students can learn more thoroughly as well as showing respect for professors and themselves through attending classes </AC>
<AC> It ' s an essential learning process </AC>
. Passing the exams is not the terminal purpose of learning . The learning process itself , however , is the most important and powerful way of evaluating a student . </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> You may love to try new things and take risks even if you aren ' t good at the things . That may help you expand experiences , look for your personalities and find your new talents . This ideal , however , doesn ' t necessarily be accomplished . If not , you might lose another chance that you could use to accomplish other things . So , I definitely believe that
<AC> you should focus on what you are good at </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body>
<AC> Focusing what you are good at helps you attain your goal </AC>
. Without doubt ,
<AC> the more time you spend on what you do well , the more likely to achieve something great you will be </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> Albert Einstein , one of the most competent physicians in history , devoted most of his life to develop theory in physics and finally established special and general relativity </AC>
. Instead ,
<AC> he hardly cared about something else </AC>
<AC> It is said that , surprisingly , he never tried to distinguish a hand soup and a facial soup </AC>
because , at least for him ,
<AC> using two different soups properly was quite annoying </AC>
. As the example above indicates ,
<AC> you will be more likely to accomplish your purpose by concentrating on what you do well </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>
<AC> If you keep doing what you already do well , you can be better good at it </AC>
<AC> When you ' re doing something well , you will feel more satisfied and more interested in it </AC>
. Then ,
<AC> you will motivate yourself to do more </AC>
. To give an example ,
<AC> I used to be good at math when I was in junior high school </AC>
. Because
<AC> I was really satisfied with the fact that I could do preferably </AC>
<AC> I became to absorb myself to try more advanced level of math problems </AC>
. As a result ,
<AC> I could not only get higher scores in math test but also solve the university - level problems </AC>
. Thus ,
<AC> by doing what you are good at , you will be better at it </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In summary ,
<AC> doing what you can already do well helps you make a big accomplishment and do it much better </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> It is a debatable subject that
<AC> children should not be allowed to play computer games </AC>
since
<AC> playing computer games is a a waste of time </AC>
. I hold a positive view against this opinion . </para-intro>
<para-body> First and foremost ,
<AC> a large number of students are obsessed in on - line computer games and as a result their performance in school are declined </AC>

<AC> An investigation done by Beijing University shows that 80 % of the students who failed in the final exam paid 2 hours or more on - online games every week , while 90 % excellent students expressed that they did not touch computer games during the most of the days </AC>
<AC> Recent research by Scientist also reveals that the youngs are more likely to be attacted by and lose themselves in these computer games , because of their low control ability </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second ,
<AC> children could learn nothing from these computer games </AC>
, therefore
<AC> time on this activity is really time wasting </AC>
. Since
<AC> all these games are developed for commercial purpose and in order to catch the eyes of the children </AC>
<AC> majority of the games use war , violence , bloody , or sexual subjects to lure the students </AC>
. However ,
<AC> those subjects are not suitable for the students and will bring bad effects to the youths </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Admittedly ,
<AC> there are a few students paying considerable time on the computer games playing finally choose computer games related jobs as their career </AC>
. But we have to realize the fact :
<AC> majority of the students failed in front of the computer games playing and they use their time for studying , sleeping and physical exerice to play these computer games </AC>

<AC> It is not uncommon that the teenages are found sleepless for several days playing on - line games at public internet bar , and there are also some media reports regarding the sudden death case of the teenages in the internet bar </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , I believe
<AC> it is better that children are not be allowed to play the computer games </AC>
. The computer games are like cigerate to adults and we need to set up rules to regulate this area . </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> This current world we situate ourselves in is rather unpredictable , even one sudden invention could bring down all the notions we used bear in mind . Most of us has endeavored to keep up with the pace of the development of today ' s world in fast pace . I personally believe that even when
<AC> fast pace may be the wise move to correspond with today ' s world </AC>
. However ,
<AC> it might not be the most beneficial move to our society </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> Primarily ,
<AC> even when the world operates in fast pace , it still requires accuracy </AC>
<AC> Even simple issues in our daily life like homework require accuracy </AC>
<AC> If we rush through the work by taking risk of making mistakes , we are actually making zero effort going through our study roughly only for the purpose of fill in before the deadline </AC>
. In short ,
<AC> it only fulfills the work itself which is rather worthless </AC>
<AC> It is our capability of work that we should improve rather than holding the belief in completing it </AC>
. Certainly
<AC> it may take time to keep up with the others if w need to review our work multiple times </AC>
, but
<AC> with consistent work soon enough we ' ll be able to bring up our speed in completion of work </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly ,
<AC> other than the importance of accuracy , the world also seeks efficiency , which concludes both minimum time completion and also criterion of quality </AC>

<AC> Even when we managed to keep up with the pace by neglecting the details of a project and only aim for a general frame of the project , this will not be something satisfy for the company and clients </AC>
<AC> We soon will be out of the picture even when we kept up with the pace </AC>
since
<AC> when the problem reveals itself we ' ll have to go back and fix the mistakes we have made </AC>
<AC> This might be even more costly and time consuming than a neat completion of work at the start </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Besides , when looking at this problem within a broader image .
<AC> Some work cannot tolerate any mistakes at all </AC>
, for instance ,
<AC> in official missions like the work done by NASA , a tiny mistake can be catastrophic </AC>
<AC> A miscalculation of the orbit in launching rocket may lead to a failure of the whole project which might worth trillions of dollars </AC>
. In such circumstances ,
<AC> even when the scientists want to finish off quickly , but they couldn ' t miss even a single part of the mission since it may trigger loads of problems </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To sum up , even when
<AC> we need to catch up with the pace of the world </AC>
<AC> it is necessary for us to be extraordinarily cautious </AC>
since
<AC> rough work is intolerable when we want to stay competitive </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Most people want to work for an employer , because they want to feel secure about their salary , or feel comfortable about other problems of having own job such as paying tax , worrying about selling , etc . Despite these problems , personally ,
<AC> I would prefer to have my own job </AC>
. My arguments are listed as follows . </para-intro>
<para-body> First ,
<AC> time is the more valuable thing , which I have in my life </AC>
<AC> By having my own business , I can manage my own time </AC>
. I
<AC> could work whenever I want , or I do not need to give reasons to my boss for a delay </AC>
<AC> I can arrange time to travel when I would like </AC>
. In addition ,
<AC> I can work long hours for earning more money </AC>
. Totally ,
<AC> the most important reason for me to be self - employed is the sense of free </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Moreover ,
<AC> earning money is the fundamental reason that why people work </AC>
<AC> The amount of money is always the most important criterion for everyone to choose a job </AC>
<AC> If I work for other people , I have to give my ideas to employers cheaply </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> I never have been rich in my life </AC>
, because
<AC> my salary is not dramatically changed </AC>
. In spite of many problems of having own business ,
<AC> I can earn more money based on my creativity and personal ideas </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To sum up , in spite of the fact that
<AC> many people are not eager to work for themselves </AC>
<AC> I would like to run my own business to control my own time , and to earn more money based on my noble ideas </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-body> I admit that
<AC> tourism can have a negative impact on the natural environment </AC>

<AC> In order to meet the needs of tourists , local governments are likely to build more facilities and infrastructures around tourist attractions , which may result in the destruction of natural habitats </AC>
<AC> Tourism also creates more pollution and waste , including growing emission of greenhouse gases , dumped leftovers and overuse of water , power and other kind of energy in luxurious hotels </AC>
. Based on these grounds , it seems that
<AC> tourism puts great pressure on ecosystem and local resources , and it should not be encouraged </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> However ,
<AC> flourishing tourism in a place can be very rewarding in terms of local economy </AC>
<AC> Holiday makers flocking to other countries are not only bound to spend on tickets of attractions , but also pay for food , accommodation , transportation and entertainment </AC>
<AC> Both local people and governments can make a large amount of money through these services , and more employment opportunities can be created as well </AC>
. I also believe
<AC> the revenue earned form tourism can be used in turn to reduce pollution and protect the environment </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Furthermore ,
<AC> the increasing development of tourism is a boon to travelers as well </AC>
<AC> The provision of direct airlines makes it possible for them to travel conveniently and comfortably </AC>
<AC> With adequate local facilities and services available , they can spend more of their holidays having fun and relaxing </AC>
. In addition ,
<AC> both locals and tourists can experience more cultures than ever before , and they can be more open - minded to eliminate preconceptions and deepen mutual understanding among nations </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> the prosperity of tourism can provide benefits for people on a global scale </AC>
. Although
<AC> there are some inevitable problems </AC>
<AC> they are outweighed by advantages and can be tackled if proper measures are taken </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> TV is an immense source of information and pupils can learn and develop various skills by watching it . But I believe that
<AC> by allowing students to watch TV at both school and house can adversely impact on their overall growth </AC>
<AC> If children spend too much time in front of TV , it will negatively impact their health and study </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> It is true that
<AC> TV is one of the prime source of data and information </AC>
<AC> There are international and local news channels like BBC , CNBC , Etv Gujarati , Etv Marathi etc to keep individuals updated about latest happenings </AC>
<AC> By watching TV , children can develop skills in extra - curriculum activities </AC>
. For example ,

<AC> Cooking programs teach about how to make new dishes and similarly , sports events like cricket , football can teach leadership skills , team building skills , communication skills and many more that can help students in their future jobs </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> But on other hand ,
<AC> watching TV for a continuously long hours can adversely impact children health </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> they can get poor eyesight in early ages of childhood , and also develop back pain </AC>
<AC> Sometimes , students watch restrictive programs not allowed for their ages and this can have major psychological consequences </AC>

<AC> Many times , students get addictive to their favorite programs like Cartoon channels , or baseball and easily get distracted from study during exam period and this can seriously impact their grades </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , I believe
<AC> demerits of watching TV outweigh its merits </AC>
and thus
<AC> if students were allowed to freely watch TV without any proper controls by parents or teachers then it would produce more negative effects on children </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Along with the increasing physical demands of human life , salary has become the most influential consideration in defining careers of everyone . I personally suppose that
<AC> there are still many other aspects which should be seen as important as income when people choose a job </AC>
. In the following paragraphs , some of my viewpoints would be given and analyzed respectively . </para-intro>
<para-body> On one hand , i agree that
<AC> money is very essential in order to meet human ' basic needs </AC>
. More specifically ,

<AC> people tend to choose high salary jobs so as to not only help themselves but also support partially or wholly their family ' s living needs such as food , clothes , accommodation , education , medication </AC>
. It is obvious that
<AC> people who are woking in art or painting industries , for example , will find it quite difficult to live comfortably and enjoyably </AC>
. This is because
<AC> they are doing what they love , their income however seems to be quite low compared to many other career paths </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> On the other hand , i believe that
<AC> if we are passionate about what we are working , we are likely to achieve success easily in that field </AC>
<AC> There are plenty of people , who are now really successful , have started working in challenging as well as competitive fields as singers , dancers and painters </AC>
. Besides ,

<AC> important factors in choosing a job such as level of happiness , satisfaction of jobs , personal relationships , professional skills , working environment , managers and colleagues should not be underestimated </AC>
. Finally ,
<AC> some people choose a career due to their desire to help others and contribute positively to their countries and societies </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , it is undeniable that
<AC> income is still a vital determination impacting us on choices of careers </AC>
. Nonetheless ,
<AC> passion on jobs , in my opinion , can bring actual happiness and help us get promoted in working to earn even more money later on </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-body> First ,
<AC> using computer constantly has bad influence on children ' s eyes </AC>
<AC> When they concentrate on computer for too long , their eyes will get tired , which is the main reason for some eyes problems , typically shortsighted </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Moreover ,
<AC> children who play games too much on computer can seriously lack communicating skills </AC>
<AC> they will know little about the outside life </AC>
. It is a well - known fact that
<AC> people who are addicted to games , especially online games , can eventually bear dangerous consequences </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> several teenagers play games without rest , which leads to health depression </AC>
<AC> a typical example is the death of Korean gamer , who had a non - stop playing for 3 days </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Finally ,
<AC> even people who are not interested in online game can still be negatively affected by using computer too much </AC>
<AC> Some social surveys have shown that a few children use computer for studying purpose , most of them are attracted by facebook , blog , etc . instead </AC>
. Due to this neglect ,
<AC> they will have a bad result in school </AC>
because
<AC> when they can not live without internet , they will have no time for their studying </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , although
<AC> it is undeniable that computer is a crucial part of human life </AC>
<AC> it still has its bad side , especially for children </AC>
. People should learn how to use it properly to make it an effective tool because computer should be used not only for entertaining but also for working and studying purpose . </para-conclusion>
<para-body>
<AC> Human being has driven many animals for their personal use such as , cows and other milch animals for yielding milk from them </AC>
<AC> Likewise , other animals such as , horses , cattles and donkeys for farming , agriculture and as a mode of transportation </AC>
<AC> Many people keep pets like dogs and cats , trained them as service dogs and snuffing dogs which are very helpful to police force and even to some blind peoples </AC>
<AC> They are kept for security purposes in houses </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> On the other hand ,
<AC> many farmers and owners exploit animals beyond their limits </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> cows are often injected by Oxytocin , a hormone which is used to forcibly increase lactation </AC>
<AC> This in turn , causes lots of discomfort and pain to the cattle </AC>
. Furthermore ,
<AC> thousand of animals undergo painful suffering or death as a result of scientific research of drugs and various products </AC>
<AC> Another example of this is cage farming which is against animal rights </AC>
<AC> Many other practices like , equestrian sport where horses run miles and miles and beaten up by jockeys to make them run more faster </AC>
<AC> And above all pleasure hunting of defenseless animals </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> From my prospective ,
<AC> human being should behave as a guardian to animals rather than as their lord or masters </AC>
<AC> Animal rights are meant to set limits on human behavior </AC>
and manipulation of them should be punished as a serious crime . </para-conclusion>
